snippet.title: Dakar 18 - Desafío Ruta 40 Rally Trailer [EU]
snippet.description: Bigmoon Entertainment releases the first DLCs for the cross-country rally simulation Dakar 18. The earlier announced “Dakar Series: Desafío Ruta 40” is now available for free for PlayStation®4, Xbox One and PC via the respective digital store pages. Additional to this DLC the team is also releasing an additional free piece of content: The “Dakar Series: Desafío Inca Rally” and more.
